resources:
Moscow Wi-Fi autologin
Send report mosmetro@thedrhax.pw Version %s Choose email client or messenger…
Try again Connect In background OK Cancel Save Install
Ignore Ignore Later Error: %s not try %d out of %d Version: %s Show verbose messages Text copied to clipboard Clear screen About
Main preferences Connection preferences Automatic background connection preferences Notifications Enable/disable various notifications Updates Acknowledgments
Automatic authentication Login automatically when connected to supported Wi-Fi networks
Reconnect to Wi-Fi
Try to reconnect to Wi-Fi network automatically when Wi-Fi signal is lost or connection is reset.
Bind process to the network Prevents leaking traffic to mobile network. (Android 5.0+)
Connection monitoring Check Internet connection every 10 seconds and restart connection on error.
Connection failure Notify on failure Alternative icons
Use white icons on Android older than 5.0 and colored icons on Android 5.0 and newer (not always supported).
Locked notification
Lock successful connection notification (notification will remain while Wi-Fi is connected)
Developer news I will be able to inform you in case of problems with application.
Delay between retries Number of seconds between retries (default: 5) Retry count Number of retries on error (default: 3)
Waiting for IP address
Number of seconds to wait for IP address assignment. If 0 is set, application will wait until device disconnects from the network (default: 0).
Check automatically Check for updates on application start Check for updates Check for new application version on developer website Update branch
Branches differ by functionality and update frequency. Tap here to see more or select a branch.
Update is available No updates available New versions will be displayed here when published.
Developer Dmitry Karikh (mosmetro@thedrhax.pw) GitHub organization github.com/mosmetro-android https://github.com/mosmetro-android VK community vk.com/wifi_v_metro https://vk.com/wifi_v_metro Telegram channel t.me/wifi_v_metro https://t.me/wifi_v_metro Telegram group t.me/joinchat/BVgshUHjD3rzVCmguodb4Q https://t.me/joinchat/BVgshUHjD3rzVCmguodb4Q
Manual connection You can connect here if this application is ignoring Wi-Fi state Create shortcut
Connect in the background Even if network name is unknown
Connecting to %s Algorithm name: %s Waiting… Checking Internet connection Already connected Initializing auth procedure Checking auth status Finishing auth procedure Unknown redirect. Trying to detect algorithm… Switching to another algorithm: %s (this is not an error) Getting redirection Getting login page Sending login form Connection established :3
Internet connection is not available redirect is not received login page is not received
device is not registered in the network\n Please, open http://wi-fi.ru and register with your phone number to get SMS with further instructions. It is only required the first time, after that application will work normally.\n Disclaimer: This application developer has nothing to do with registration. Registration is required by MaximaTelecom ISP (http://maximatelecom.ru).
server does not respond or responds with error unable to identify the provider
provider %s is not supported by application yet. Maybe the network is maintained by two providers one of which is not supported yet. We apologize for inconvenience.
expected redirect to another algorithm, received redirect to MosMetroV3 (infinite loop)
Successfully connected Click for details Device is not registered Click to proceed with registration Unable to connect Click to get details or retry Network is not supported Waiting…
Waiting for IP address… IP address%s assigned within %d seconds
Revertron Numerous algorithm recommendations https://github.com/Revertron Helped collecting authentication dumps Mikhail Kuropatkin https://telegram.me/kuropatkin Alexander Krotov First Pull-request, Gradle migration, English translation https://github.com/ilabdsf Igor Dyatlov Graphic design, logo https://github.com/igor-dyatlov

1U8aphhieUGX1TFY9dTmAujeo2WDQaD7m 0x949aecb10ae89673a9574f53bda04baffddabff7 https://money.yandex.ru/to/410014087156910 Wi-Fi control Internet checks Open settings Request the permission Energy saving Starting with Android 6.0, you need to add this application to the energy saving whitelist, so that it can access the network in the background. Otherwise, background process may completely freeze due to the new energy saving policy.
Auto connect More information Links, communities, contibutors Detecting the provider… Stop Foreground process Bind background process to notification to protect it from being killed. If you disable this option, background process will be killed even if you simply open and close the app window. Connection timeout Number of seconds to wait for server answer. If 0 is set, application will wait until connection error is caught (default: 5). This function seems to be unsupported on your device. Sorry :( Looks like you don\'t have any apps suitable for this link. Trying default algorithm (MosMetroV2 or MosMetroV3)… Notification priority A value between -2 and 2 that affects the priority of all notifications. (default: 0) Connected successfully Notify on successful connection failed to save log to file You were temporarily banned by provider :( Interval of checks Amount of seconds between internet checks. Affects traffic and power consumption. Delay range (seconds) Set the range of random delays applied for every request. Emulate resource loading (beta) Download all resources included into HTML page to emulate browser activity. User-Agent header Set the User-Agent HTTP header to disguise this app as browser. The random one is chosen by default. Do not warn anymore Be careful! Connection log may contain sensitive data such as your MAC-address or phone number. Do not send this file to public chats or social networks. Apply to all requests Add random delay to every request. By default delays are applied only to specific requests. Random delays Start manual connection directly from launcher System log Write log messages to system log to allow debugging in case of crash. Crash reports Automatically send crash reports to application developer. Main branches Experimental branches Debug options Automatic reports, LogCat, etc. MosMetroV3 (welcome.wi-fi.ru) This algorithm is required only in Saint Petersburg, but may become required in other regions in the future. can\'t compile RegEx: %s Switching back to algorithm %s Store the last log Log will be written into internal storage of the application. It will be sent along with ACRA reports in case of crash. algorithm initialization failed <<<<<<< HEAD Location permission Starting with Android 9.0, you need grant location permission to this application, so that it can automatically connect to network. Otherwise, only manual connection will be available ======= Location permission Starting with Android 9.0, you need to grant location permission to this application, so that it can automatically connect to network.
